alert.note: Alert for Polk; San Jacinto (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 9:29PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central San Jacinto and southern Polk counties through 1000 PM CDT... At 929 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Livingston, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Livingston, Shepherd, Onalaska, Goodrich, Seven Oaks, Lake Livingston State Park, Alabama-Coushatta Reservation, West Livingston, Leggett and Segno. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
